name: Ninja Baker
description:
All he wanted in his life was to leave his past behind and put his heart and soul into a quaint, homely bakery. However, Ninja Baker is forced again to don his costu... I mean uniform, and brave a new threat. He will face down the nefarious Mcguffin Man in the only way he knows how; convoluted parkour. 

A cutesy, precision platformer made in 50 hours, where you swing and jump your way through 20 levels. Each level has an optional collectible cookie and incredibly tight target completion times.

Hope you enjoy!

When playing in the browser, the game saves progress using Cookies, so you will lose data if you clear them.
